Author: staunch
Content:
Not sure this would be much of a problem with consumers. How many people know about open source reverse engineered implementations of file sharing protocols?

It might even be a plus. Samba is a successful project, perhaps they can milk some of that goodwill from the subconsciouses of those who do know.

\n

Author: staunch
Content:
This is a PayPerPost astroturfing spam blog post. Do not upvote. msgbeepa is spamming these regularly.

Author: staunch
Content: I'm not saying Apollo will replace Firefox -- just that Apollo will win the war for developer attention in developing "rich internet applications".\n

Author: staunch
Content:
Listening to your inner critic will convince you every idea you have, every opportunity to consider, everything you do and say, are worthless.

If only there was a way to kill that skeptical prick. I think my inner critic could have convinced Steve Jobs that PCs would never take off.\n
